info.name: Hackaday Whitewash
info.description: The main feature of this style is to change the background to white and darken the text colors. The ads and sidebar have been removed, and the header/footer have been updated to reflect a minimalist style.
info.additionalInfo: ===Version Info=== v0.3b - 3/20/19 - Search bar location changed (again), and a few small format changes. v0.2b - 3/2/17 - Added a few changes in response to a few small Hackaday format changes (the search bar location is now fixed). The style is also no longer global. v0.1b - 9/20/16 - This is my first release, which attempts to change entire Hackaday color scheme, hide all ads, and remove unnecessary widgets. ===Instructions=== No options to configure. Just install and enjoy!
